text: Al-Azhar UniversityPronounced "AZ-har", is a university and mosque in Cairo, Egypt. It is the main centre of Arabic literature and Sunni Islamic learning in the world. It is also the world's second-oldest surviving university.Alatas, Syed Farid, 2006.
